FuncDef: This command sets the value of the restart-time that is advertised in the router s graceful-restart capability. If this command is not configured, the default is 300.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the restart-time that is advertised in the router s graceful-restart capability. Values-0 to 4095 seconds. ParamDefault: Default- config>router>bgp>graceful-restart: 120 secondsconfig>router>bgp>group>graceful-restart: 300 secondsconfig>router>bgp>group>neighbor>graceful-restart: 300 seconds
